Package com.soprabanking.ips.services

Class FeedService

java.lang.Object
com.soprabanking.ips.services.FeedService
@Service
public class FeedService
extends java.lang.Object
Class representing Feed Service that is responsible for providing the business logic for servicing the requests for retrieval of view based list of Proposal objects from the database ,received from the FeedController

Feed Service provides a range of service methods each of which is responsible for processing various request for performing the following operations:

  1. Fetching list of all the proposals stored in the database,and
  2. Fetching list of all the proposals created by a particular User

Service methods invokes the respective methods of ProposalDAO in order to return the required results to the FeedController

Author:
araghav
See Also:
Proposal, User, ProposalDAO, FeedController

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Proposal> fetchAllProposals​(java.lang.String body)
    Returns a List of all the Proposal objects stored in database in response to the specified Request Body String containing the following: A Start Date and an End Date to specify the time duration for filtering of Proposal objects based on their Creation dates.Only the proposals created in the specified time duration will be included in the result. A Page value for specifying the Page Number in order to implement pagination of the resulting list of proposals.
    java.util.List<Proposal> fetchUserProposals​(java.lang.String body)
    Returns a List of all the Proposal objects created by a particular User in response to the specified Request Body String containing the following: A Start Date and an End Date to specify the time duration for filtering of Proposal objects based on their Creation dates.Only the proposals created in the specified time duration will be included in the result. A Page value for specifying the Page Number in order to implement pagination of the resulting list of proposals.

      public FeedService()

  • Method Details

    • fetchAllProposals

      public java.util.List<Proposal> fetchAllProposals​(java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      Returns a List of all the Proposal objects stored in database in response to the specified Request Body String containing the following:
      1. A Start Date and an End Date to specify the time duration for filtering of Proposal objects based on their Creation dates.Only the proposals created in the specified time duration will be included in the result.
      2. A Page value for specifying the Page Number in order to implement pagination of the resulting list of proposals.
      3. A size value for specifying the number of proposals required on a given page(specified by Page value).

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, Start Date and End Dates specifying the time period of creation of every Proposal in the resulting list,Page value specifying the page number of the list of Proposal objects to be fetched and a Size value specifying the number of Proposal objects required on the given page) and then retrieves the subset of list of proposals created in the specified time duration ,created/sliced according to the specified Page and Size Values with the help of ProposalDAO.fetchAllProposals(Date, Date, Pageable) method of ProposalDAO.

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for fetching the List of all the Proposals stored in database
      Returns:
      List of all the Proposal objects stored in database
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the Request Body is not in the correct format or if the request parameter values are invalid or not acceptable
      See Also:
      ProposalDAO.fetchAllProposals(Date, Date, Pageable)

    • fetchUserProposals

      public java.util.List<Proposal> fetchUserProposals​(java.lang.String body) throws java.lang.Exception
      Returns a List of all the Proposal objects created by a particular User in response to the specified Request Body String containing the following:
      1. A Start Date and an End Date to specify the time duration for filtering of Proposal objects based on their Creation dates.Only the proposals created in the specified time duration will be included in the result.
      2. A Page value for specifying the Page Number in order to implement pagination of the resulting list of proposals.
      3. A size value for specifying the number of proposals required on a given page(specified by Page value).
      4. id of User specifying the user ,proposals created by whom have to be fetched.

      This method converts the String argument representing the Request Body to a JSON request,retrieves request parameters and values from request body(in this case, Start Date and End Dates specifying the time period of creation of every Proposal in the resulting list,Page value specifying the page number of the list of Proposal objects to be fetched , id value of User specifying the user whose proposals have to be fetched and a Size value specifying the number of Proposal objects required on the given page) and then retrieves the subset of list of proposals created by the specified User in the specified time duration ,created/sliced according to the specified Page and Size Values with the help of ProposalDAO.fetchUserProposals(Long, Date, Date, Pageable) method of ProposalDAO.

      Parameters:
      body - String object representing the Request Body for fetching the List of all the Proposals created by a particular User
      Returns:
      List of all the Proposal that were created by the specified User
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the Request Body is not in the correct format or if the request parameter values are invalid or not acceptable
      See Also:
      ProposalDAO.fetchUserProposals(Long, Date, Date, Pageable)
